CustomField.description: Enter the number of points to add to lead score. Negative numbers are subtracted from Lead Score. If Rule Type = Campaign Member, then points count towards Campaign Score on both the lead and Campaign Member.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the number of points to add to lead score. Negative numbers are subtracted from Lead Score. If Rule Type = Campaign Member, then points count towards Campaign Score on both the lead and Campaign Member.
CustomField.label: Points
